类 com.lef.scanner.Region
的使用

  • 使用Region的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    com.lef.scanner  

    • com.lef.scanner中Region的使用

      返回变量类型为Region的类型的com.lef.scanner中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.util.Collection<Region> IBeaconManager.getMonitoredRegions() 
      java.util.Collection<Region> IBeaconManager.getRangedRegions() 
      参数类型为Region的com.lef.scanner中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void MonitorNotifier.didDetermineStateForRegion(int state, Region region)
      当进入离开region时状态发生变化时回调 Called with a state value of MonitorNotifier.INSIDE when at least one iBeacon in a Region is visible.
      void MonitorNotifier.didEnterRegion(Region region)
      当进入自定义的region时回调 Called when at least one iBeacon in a Region is visible.
      void MonitorNotifier.didExitRegion(Region region)
      当离开自定义的region时回调 Called when no iBeacons in a Region are visible.
      void RangeNotifier.didRangeBeaconsInRegion(java.util.Collection<IBeacon> iBeacons, Region region)
      按自定义的扫描周期回调显示所有扫描到的beacon Called once per second to give an estimate of the distance to visible iBeacons
      void RangeNotifier.onGoneBeacons(java.util.Collection<IBeacon> iBeacons, Region region)
      回调显示region中消失的beacon
      void RangeNotifier.onNewBeacons(java.util.Collection<IBeacon> iBeacons, Region region)
      回调显示region中新扫描到的beacon
      void RangeNotifier.onUpdateBeacon(java.util.Collection<IBeacon> iBeacons, Region region)
      回调更新region中beacon的信息
      void IBeaconManager.startMonitoringBeaconsInRegion(Region region)
      启动监测是否进入某个定义的region
      Tells the IBeaconService to start looking for iBeacons that match the passed Region object.
      void IBeaconManager.startRangingBeaconsInRegion(Region region)
      启动扫描定义的一个region 的beacon，扫描到的beacon将更加定义的region过滤
      Tells the IBeaconService to start looking for iBeacons that match the passed Region object, and providing updates on the estimated distance very seconds while iBeacons in the Region are visible.
      void IBeaconManager.stopMonitoringBeaconsInRegion(Region region)
      停止监测
      Tells the IBeaconService to stop looking for iBeacons that match the passed Region object.
      void IBeaconManager.stopRangingBeaconsInRegion(Region region)
      停止某个区域的通知
      Tells the IBeaconService to stop looking for iBeacons that match the passed Region object and providing distance information for them.
